item.title: mac下使用supervisor
item.description: mac下使用supervisor 安装 使用brew进行 安装 $ brew install supervisor ==> Downloading http://7xkcej.dl1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/bottles/supervisor-3.3.1.sierra.bottle.tar.gz ######################################################################## 100.0% ==> Pouring supervisor-3.3.1.sierra.bottle.tar.gz ==> Using the sandbox ==> Caveats To have launchd start supervisor now and restart at login: brew services start supervisor Or, if you don't want/need a background service you can
